summary: Tech encompasses innovative practices, broad coding skills, and disruptive mindsets. It includes profiles of industry leaders like Jan Hein Hoogstad as well as resources to inspire creativity and ecosystem development. Courses like 'Practice Innovation' emphasize visionary leadership, adaptability, and artistry in everyday work.
excerpt: Tech includes courses like 'Practice Innovation', which teaches visionary leadership and innovative thinking. Profiles feature industry leaders like Jan Hein Hoogstad, focused on impactful ecosystems.
